title: Home First Finance Company India allots 22,701 equity shares under ESOP - Business Standard
content: Home First Finance Company India allots 22,701 equity shares under ESOP  Business Standard
description: The paid-up share capital of the Company has accordingly increased from Rs. 17,52,22,004 consisting of 8,76,11,002 equity shares having a face value of Rs. 2/- each to Rs. 17,52,67,406 consisting of 8,76,33,703 equity shares having a face value of
